entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
